text: . To describe structural relations between classes and objects in a problem domain. Concepts Class structures . Generalization: A general class (the super class) describes properties common to a group of specialized classes (the subdlasses). . Cluster: A collection of related classes. Object structures . Aggregation: A superior object (the whole) consists of a number of objects (the parts). . Association: A meaningful relation between a number of objects. Principles . Study abstract, static relations between classes. . Study concrete, dynamic relations between objects. e Model only the necessary structural relations. m Â« A dlass diagram with classes and structures.
